org.spf4j.stackmonitor
Class Sampler

java.lang.Object
  org.spf4j.stackmonitor.Sampler

@ThreadSafe
public final class Sampler
extends Object

Utility to sample stack traces. Stack traces can be persisted for later analysis. please read http://sape.inf.usi.ch/sites/default/files/publication/pldi10.pdf pure java stack sampling will probably have safepoint bias.

Author:
zoly

Dumps the sampled stacks to file. the collected samples are reset

id - - id will be added to file name returns the name of the file.
